seller_description: This versatile blender lets you make smoothies and juices within seconds and is also perfect for dry grinding, chutneys, and dips. Powered by a robust 500 W copper motor, it can effortlessly grind almost any food. Designed for convenience, it includes an easy-to-make-and-carry sipper jar. Backed by best-in-segment customer support and quality, this blender is a reliable choice for your kitchen needs.
review: The blade attachment cracked within a week of normal usage, and it wasn't able to grind dry fruits as advertised.
Expected-output: The seller promises high durability with unbreakable jars and a strong blade for grinding various food items, including dry fruits. The promotional images depict a reliable product designed for tough grinding tasks. In contrast, the buyer's image shows a cracked blade attachment, contradicting the seller's durability claim. This discrepancy highlights a quality control issue, making the seller responsible for the dissatisfaction.
label: -1 buyers opinion
